reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a perfect wedding guest dress with nice material and color, particularly appreciating its flattering shape and comfort. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits fabulously, others mention it's tight around the booty. Moreover, the straps are problematic as they keep falling down. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs a litt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Not See Through
items.body: I bought this last second as my rehearsal dinner dress the night before my wedding. And this came in almost the next day. I was scared at first thinking that it would be see through, but it wasn't at all. The quality is perfect and is easy to wash. It was a little clingy to my stomach area but not super tight where I felt like you could see everything. This was a perfect dress for last second and worth my money! Read more
items.author: Hailie Smock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Very happy
items.body: Excellent buy for the money. Very happy with this purchase. I am 5â€™4â€ and weigh 105 lbs. I bought the yellow XS and was pleased with the fit and length. I did not find this item to be see through, but I also did not wear black undies so maybe I didnâ€™t put it to â€œthe test,â€ but I feel common sense is warranted here. I wore this to my sonâ€™s wedding in September. The fabric weight was perfect summer weather. I got lots of compliments on the simple style of the dress and how it looked like it could be relaxed or refined depending on the accents and occasion. All in all, I would buy this again in another color if I have another event in the future. Iâ€™ll keep this one too for future things. Read more
items.author: becky

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Wedding Guest Dress!
items.body: The perfect wedding guest dress! The length and fit is perfect. Minus one star because there was a small snag in the fabric that caused a line in the dress. If you are a slouchy girl like me, you have to sit up straight with your shoulders back in order for the straps to stay up. If you slouch, the straps will fall off your shoulders which can be annoying. The dress is not very stretchy but is very comfortable. The low back is stunning and I loved dancing the night away in this gown! Read more
items.author: Maddie Allman

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizes among colors are not the same
items.body: I ordered the pink color and the Olive color in the same size. I would expect them to be the same but they fit completely different. I love the olive colored one but the pink was longer and the top was fitted but would dip and there would definitely be a nip slip if I ever wore this in public. Strange that they are not the same but maybe it will work for someone else. The material was nice to the touch and looks nice and the pink is gorgeous but I had to unfortunately return it. The Olive dress is stunning though and I feel a lot more secure in the top area! Read more
items.author: AmazonBuyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Survived lots of dancing
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! It was perfect for my work holiday party, and will definitely be great to wear to future weddings or other parties. I love the color and the fabric feels so soft and well put together. It was easy to stream. The sizing is good, I got a medium and I am 5â€™7â€ 150lbs for reference. I just wore pasties underneath, it is open in the back but has a tie to secure it. Straps are adjustable. It feels similar to other bridesmaid dresses I have, the quality is great. The photos make it look more blue, the mirror pics are more color accurate. It is definitely more teal-blue. Read more
items.author: Ripptide808

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Easy to Wear Wedding Guest Dress
items.body: Wore this to a summer wedding and it was perfect. The satin drapes really nicely and the cowl neck lays beautifully without needing constant adjusting. It feels light and comfortable but still looks elevated and elegant. I got a lot of compliments and it photographed really well. Definitely a great option for weddings or any dressy summer event. Read more
items.author: XP

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute BUT the straps fall down ðŸ‘ŽðŸ¼
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Hear me out. This dress is gorgeous, the price point is great, the sizing is accurate, material is thick and looks like very high quality. BUT and this is a MAJOR butâ€¦ the straps fall down like literally every 2 seconds no matter how you adjust them. Even if youâ€™re just standing there doing nothing. Theyâ€™re like stitched too close to your armpits. I was planning to wear it to a wedding but had to return because I donâ€™t want a strap falling down and a booby coming out while Iâ€™m walking down the aisle or getting low on the dancefloor. Itâ€™s very boobilicious would definitely need like some fabric tape to keep the fabric up by the boobs. Im a size large, Iâ€™m curvy with a big butt, 38C and I ordered a large it did fit. Read more
items.author: emmy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but colors are off.
items.body: I wore this dress for my sonâ€™s wedding. It fit well and was very flattering. I give it four stars versus five because I ordered the burgundy initially but returned it due to color - a summer red, not burgundy. Then I ordered the mocha. Again the color was off (beige not mocha). I kept and wore the beige and it worked just fine, but would have preferred a darker color i.e. mocha. This dress is definitely a winner if you can get the colors right. Read more
items.author: Pam

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Deep Green, Blue, Burgundy, Fuchsia, Light Green, Black, Champagne, Mocha, Sage, Olive, Silver, Navy, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
